channel.title: Auto-Cache Download help
channel.description: So i went into CacheDownloader.java added my dropbox link, then i went to signlink & changed the name, yet when i open my client it just says connection error, when i look in my command prompt these are the errors [code]drawLoadingText(0, "Connecting to File Server...");[/code] for some reason its only downloading like 4 files from my cache.. how can i fix this

item.title: Auto-Cache Download help
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Probably having trouble getting to the cache. Signlink creates the directory where the cache is stored. If you have code similar to

"Cachedownloadlink.zip", "cache.zip", "", "cache"

In your client.java, make sure that cache.zip and cache are the name of your client, or whatever you have in Signlink.

Read full topic
